context: Hello! I am great! What kind of movies do you like?
I love the The Notebook (2004) Do you know any other movies thats similar?

It is about a girl and a boy in high school who are very different but end up falling in love The boy finds out that the girl has cancer and that devastates him.
resp: Another great movie is The Best of Me (2014)
